share_link:
Check out this awesome app called Frontend Forever. It's a free app that helps you to create and share code. 
Also you can download more than 100+ pdf books available on this app 

Download it now from https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.frontendforever
vip_desc: Get access to all of the features of the app without ads. And gain more points for every activity.
